mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seller_tb (id, pw, phone_number, store_name, business_uid, address, store_lat, store_lng, created_at) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pw}, #{phoneNumber}, #{storeName}, #{businessUid}, #{address}, #{storeLat}, #{storeLng}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR) )
mapper.select: SELECT uid, id, pw, phone_number AS phoneNumber, store_name AS storeName, business_uid AS businessUid, address, store_lat AS storeLat, store_lng AS storeLng, refresh_token AS refreshToken FROM seller_tb WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM seller_tb WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT uid, id, pw, phone_number AS phoneNumber, store_name AS storeName, business_uid AS businessUid, address, store_lat AS storeLat, store_lng AS storeLng, refresh_token AS refreshToken FROM seller_tb WHERE uid = #{uid}

SELECT uid AS sellerUid, store_name AS storeName, phone_number AS phoneNumber, business_uid AS businessNumber, address AS address, store_lat AS storeLat, store_lng AS storeLng, owner_name AS ownerName, store_open AS storeOpen, store_close AS storeClose, bank_name AS bankName, account_number AS accountNumber, account_holder AS accountHolder FROM seller_tb WHERE uid = #{sellerUid} LIMIT 1
SELECT uid FROM seller_tb WHERE business_uid = #{businessUid} AND id = #{username} AND phone_number = #{phoneNumber}
mapper.update: UPDATE seller_tb SET pw = #{newPassword} WHERE uid = #{uid}
